attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It' someone's choice to decide what they do with their lifes

and the profession they choose to follow

just like everyone has the right of choice

people choose to be solicitors professors politicians shop assistants brick layers chefs shopkeepers farmers ect..vagabonds and poets...

its their choice and it should be respected and apreciated as they help reduce the amount of rapes and violence in general and save many a marriages too !!

prostitutes should have a right to work in SAFETY in a CLEAN enviroment
with LEGAL PROTECTION and have their pension too juts like any other worker...

THIS IS THE 21 CENTURY 

female/ male 

gay/straight

its their choice and as such in a DEMOCRACY should be respected




thank you!
please sign and take part in history and making this country again a beacon that others follow ....

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
